detail_desc: T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details. Lined cups with removable inserts, and narrow, double shoulder straps that join to form a racer back. Wide elastication at the hem. Light support.
Short, sleeveless dress in stretch viscose jersey with a draped neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Pleats in the sides for a fitted style and draped effect.
Shirt in airy cotton poplin with a grandad collar, visible buttons at the top and concealed buttons to the hem. Chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a pocket at the top. Press-studs at the top and sides, and concealed press-studs at the crotch in sizes 4-12M. Seam with belt loops at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumpsuit in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and shoulder straps with metal rings decorated with sparkly stones. Wrapover top, a seam under the bust and straight, wide legs.
Jersey playsuit with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and wrapover top with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Metal hair grips with snake-shaped decorations and rhinestones. The zinc content of the hair grips is recycled.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring with tassels at the ends. Gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Lined with a short jersey skirt.

Shirt in a textured Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with contrasting colour elbow patches and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Boots in imitation leather with an imitation suede shaft and a tab with a decorative metal buckle at the top and over the foot. Fleece linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a round neckline, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Short-sleeved dress in viscose jersey with a seam at the waist with soft draping and a knot detail at the side. Unlined.

Shirt in cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with concealed elastication, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Microfibre T-shirt bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and no visible seams for better comfort.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a smocked bodice, wide, tie-top shoulder straps, regular waist and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist with a button and a fake fly.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, patterned cotton jersey. Slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and a lace trim at the hem.
Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey.

Popover shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, V neck, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Relaxed fit.
Santa hat in a soft knit with a pompom on top. Jersey lining.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Chukka boots in imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a padded tongue with an appliqué. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave made from an organic cotton blend with inset hole embroidery. Deep, frill-trimmed V-neck, long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted, smocked top woven in a linen blend with elasticated shoulder straps, buttons down the front and frill trims.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-neck with a wrapover front and an opening with ties at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated, trumpet cuffs with decorative bows. Short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, printed jersey. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and short ties at the front, and short legs.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides.
Trousers in rustly nylon with a high waist and tapered legs. Elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hems, and patch front pockets.
Short V-neck dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary, long-sleeved T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, a coin pocket at the front, back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a concealed zip down the back. Seam and drawstring at the waist, side pockets and short, wide legs. Unlined.

Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather. Narrow, crossover foot straps with a decorative spotted tulle flower on top, and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Heel caps with a lightly padded edge, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.

Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into the drawstring storage bag it is supplied with. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short, A-line parka in twill made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Joggers in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a round neckline and print motif on the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button and raw-edge hems.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front, ribbed cuffs and slits in the sides.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round metal pendant and fabric tassel. Adjustable length, 68-76.5 cm.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, leg pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs, and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline that has gathers at the front and a small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, elbow-length puff sleeves with narrow covered elastication and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in ribbed jersey with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Long, A-line dress in a crisp organic cotton weave with smocking at the top. Square neckline with concealed elastication to keep the dress in place and wide, half-length sleeves with a voluminous puff at the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the knees and a flared, asymmetric skirt. Unlined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and one inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless hoodie in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood and yoke at the back. Small print motif on the front, a kangaroo pocket and short slits in the sides.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Long gloves in leather with suede sections. Unlined.
Long-sleeved shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
Sunglasses with wide, square-shaped plastic cat eye frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads. High waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
Wide waist belt with a round metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with cutaway coverage at the back.
Glittery boots in imitation suede with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the shaft. Faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
